alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Gadsden; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 9:23PM EDT until August 04 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 1045 PM EDT. * At 922 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles north of Quincy to 14 miles southeast of Blountstown, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Carrabelle, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Quincy, Havana, St. Marks, Midway, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Greensboro, Orange, Wakulla, Gretna, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Jewel Fire Tower and Wakulla Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
